name: ViewListDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a specific list in ClickUp.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a specific list in ClickUp by providing the list ID. It helps in obtaining metadata and current status of the list.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the list to view details. Right-click the list in your ClickUp sidebar, select 'Copy link', and paste the URL's last string.

value_schema.description: The List ID. To find the List ID, right-click the List in your Sidebar, select Copy link, and paste the link in your URL. The last string in the URL is your List ID.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The List ID. To find the List ID, right-click the List in your Sidebar, select Copy link, and paste the link in your URL. The last string in the URL is your List ID.

value_schema.description: The List ID. To find the List ID, right-click the List in your Sidebar, select Copy link, and paste the link in your URL. The last string in the URL is your List ID.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
